Package student

Class TuitionManagerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • student.TuitionManagerController
  • public class TuitionManagerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the client driver class that takes in user-inputted information and does functions with them using the Roster class
    Author:
    David Halim, Stephen Juan

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method automatically runs when the GUI is opened. It disables certain fields and creates an instance of Roster.

      • setStateStatus

        private void setStateStatus​(javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup stateCheckBox,
                            boolean disable,
                            boolean selected)
        This method is a helper method that either disables/enables, selects/deselects the radio buttons in NY or CT.
        Parameters:
        stateCheckBox - - the toggle group that contains NY or CT
        disable - - boolean that is passed to disable/enable radio buttons
        selected - - boolean that is passed to select/deselect radio buttons

      • non_Resident_Event

        void non_Resident_Event​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This is an event handler that enables tristate and international when nonresident is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - - when the user clicks nonresident

      • resident_Event

        void resident_Event​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This is an event that disables everything that isn't applicable to resident when it is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks on resident

      • tristate_Event

        void tristate_Event​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This is an event handler that enables the state options when tristate is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks on tristate

      • international_Event

        void international_Event​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This is an event handler that enables study abroad for students.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks on international

      • studyAbroad_Event

        void studyAbroad_Event​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This is an event handler that enables/disable creditSlider according to studyAbroad state.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks on studyAbroad

      • add_a_student

        void add_a_student​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This button creates an instance of student with the selected attributes. Also checks exceptions for invalid/missing data.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks Add Student

      • remove_a_student

        void remove_a_student​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This button removes an instance of student with the selected attributes. Also checks exceptions for invalid/missing data and if the student exists or not.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks Remove Student

      • pay_tuition

        void pay_tuition​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This button takes in the student name/major and get the payment and date to pay their tuition. It also checks for invalid dates and amounts.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks on Pay

      • set_financial_aid

        void set_financial_aid​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method sets the financial aid for resident students. It checks if the amount is valid and if they have received financial aid before.
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks on Set

      • setStudyAbroad

        void setStudyAbroad​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This button takes allows international student to enroll in the Study Abroad program
        Parameters:
        event - - when user clicks on Enroll in Study Abroad Program

        event - - when user clicks on Print List
